snippet: The Department of Defense has identified 1,943 American service members who have died as a part of the Afghan war and related operations.
abstract: Defense Department confirms the deaths of two American service members in Afghanistan. (S)2
lead_paragraph: The Department of Defense has identified 1,943 American service members who have died as a part of the Afghan war and related operations. It confirmed the deaths of the following Americans recently: CLARK, Bruce K., 43, Capt., Army; Spencerport, N.Y.; Company A, Troop Command, William Beaumont Army Medical Center.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: UNITED STATES DEFENSE AND MILITARY FORCES
